jobs.description: The Roaring Twenties, sometimes stylized as Roaring '20s, refers to the 1920s decade in music and fashion, as it happened in Western society and Western culture.
experiences: Looked out at the green light
Fell in love with Daisy and threw a massive party where there were a ton of people there having fun and partying really hard

jobs.description: The Great Depression was an economic shock that affected most countries across the world. It was a period of economic depression that became evident after a major fall in stock prices in the United States.
experiences: Fought someone in the street and man did I lose like he really beat me up, I'm unsure how I'll ever recover emotionaly
Asked a passerby on the street if I could have a piece of bread and they politely declined which I thought was sort of rude to be honest

jobs.description: World War II or the Second World War was a global conflict that lasted from 1939 to 1945. The vast majority of the world's countries, including all the great powers, fought as part of two opposing military alliances: the Allies and the Axis.
experiences: Fought in the trenches and lost both of my feet unfortunately
Rolled around in a tank and looked for bad guys
Ate military rations like really hard biscuits and other similar foods

jobs.description: The Cold War was a period of geopolitical tension between the United States and the Soviet Union and their respective allies, the Western Bloc and the Eastern Bloc.
experiences: Found out that Communists aren't a lot of fun
I was out on the water in a dingy during the Cuban Missile Crisis and it was a close call
Worked as an undercover secret agent in Russia and I was pretty good

jobs.description: Flower power was a slogan used during the late 1960s and early 1970s as a symbol of passive resistance and nonviolence.
experiences: Did the peace sign a lot and other people enjoyed it
Rode around on a bus and waved to people and told them to be peaceful
Went to DC and protested people going to war because that's no fun
